meanings.definition: The act of converting someone to a particular religious faith through missionary work.
meanings.sent1: The missionizations in the village brought many new believers to the church.
meanings.sent2: The history books often mention the missionizations that took place in remote regions.
meanings.sent3: The missionizations at the bake sale were so successful, they converted everyone to chocolate lovers.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for missionizations was like a beacon of light in the darkness of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The missionizations were like seeds of faith planted in the hearts of the community.

meanings.definition: The process of establishing or operating missions.
meanings.sent1: The missionizations of new churches in the area have brought hope to many.
meanings.sent2: Government funding supports the missionizations of humanitarian missions worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The missionizations of the new space station were delayed due to technical issues.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to missionizations was as strong as the foundation of a building.
meanings.sent5: The missionizations were like threads weaving a tapestry of goodwill across the globe.
